name: Create a SendX contact from a new Google Sheets spreadsheet row
description:
Every time a new row is added to your Google Sheets spreadsheet, Make will automatically create a SendX contact.

The template uses [this spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1Q35CXAEygggqpsCqJmBhh2oWZZE_tfNzciN4rHNtNPA/edit?usp=sharing).
